attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Defines the text label.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: If set, defines the icon shown before the label.

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.description: If set to true, expands the accordion to display its content.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If set to true, disables mouse clicks and the style gets updated.

properties.name: label
properties.description: Defines the text label.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: If set, defines the icon shown before the label.

properties.name: expanded
properties.description: If set to true, expands the accordion to display its content.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: If set to true, disables mouse clicks and the style gets updated.

slots.description: Displayed inside the accordion when it is expanded.

slots.name: header
slots.description: If used, the header slot replaces the default text label and expand arrow with custom content.

slots.name: functions
slots.description: Displayed close to the 'expand' arrow.

slots.name: footer
slots.description: Displayed below the content when it is expanded.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: If set, defines the text label shown on the left side (if mobile is unset).

attributes.name: logo
attributes.description: If set, defines the logo shown on the left side.

attributes.name: mobile
attributes.description: If set, toggles the mobile variation.

properties.name: label
properties.description: If set, defines the text label shown on the left side (if mobile is unset).

properties.name: logo
properties.description: If set, defines the logo shown on the left side.

properties.name: mobile
properties.description: If set, toggles the mobile variation.

events.name: logo-clicked
events.description: Fired when clicking on the logo.

slots.description: The central content area. Used for hosting components such as Tabs.

slots.name: functions
slots.description: Displayed on the right side (if mobile is unset). Used for hosting components such as Icon and Avatar.

slots.name: left
slots.description: Displayed on the left side (if mobile is set to true). Used for hosting components such as Icon.

slots.name: right
slots.description: Displayed on the right side (if mobile is set to true). Used for hosting components such as Icon.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: If set, defines the text label shown next to the icon/image. If the label is set and an image is not defined, the initials will be shown as a placeholder.

attributes.name: info
attributes.description: If set, defines the information text shown below the label.

attributes.name: image
attributes.description: If set, replaces the placeholder image with a custom image.

attributes.name: condensed
attributes.description: If set, the image is shown in a smaller size.

properties.name: label
properties.description: If set, defines the text label shown next to the icon/image. If the label is set and an image is not defined, the initials will be shown as a placeholder.

properties.name: info
properties.description: If set, defines the information text shown below the label.

properties.name: image
properties.description: If set, replaces the placeholder image with a custom image.

properties.name: condensed
properties.description: If set, the image is shown in a smaller size.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: If set, degines the number shown inside the badge. Numbers bigger than 3 digits are shown as 999+.

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: If set, a status icon is shown inside the badge. Accepted values are error, warning, success.

properties.name: label
properties.description: If set, degines the number shown inside the badge. Numbers bigger than 3 digits are shown as 999+.

properties.name: status
properties.description: If set, a status icon is shown inside the badge. Accepted values are error, warning, success.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Defines the text label.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: If set, replaces the text label with a custom icon.

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Defines the color. The possible values are primary, secondary and tertiary

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If set to true, disables mouse clicks and the style gets updated.

properties.name: label
properties.description: Defines the text label.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: If set, replaces the text label with a custom icon.

properties.name: color
properties.description: Defines the color. The possible values are primary, secondary and tertiary

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: If set to true, disables mouse clicks and the style gets updated.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: If set, defines the text label.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: If set, defines the icon shown close to the label.

attributes.name: image
attributes.description: If set, defines the image shown on top of the card.

attributes.name: flex-direction
attributes.description: Defines the direction in which the slotted content flows (e.g. top to bottom or left to right). Possible values are column and row.

attributes.name: flat
attributes.description: If set, background, shadows and external padding are not shown.

properties.name: label
properties.description: If set, defines the text label.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: If set, defines the icon shown close to the label.

properties.name: image
properties.description: If set, defines the image shown on top of the card.

properties.name: flexDirection
properties.description: Defines the direction in which the slotted content flows (e.g. top to bottom or left to right). Possible values are column and row.

properties.name: flat
properties.description: If set, background, shadows and external padding are not shown.

slots.description: Displayed inside the content area.

slots.name: header
slots.description: Shown on top of the card, below the label (if any is set).

slots.name: functions
slots.description: Shown on the right side of the label or header slot.

slots.name: footer
slots.description: Shown below the content area.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Defines the text label.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: Defines whether the item is currently active or not.

properties.name: label
properties.description: Defines the text label.

properties.name: active
properties.description: Defines whether the item is currently active or not.

slots.description: The default slot. Takes `kor-breadcrumb-item`s as children.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: If set, defines the text label.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: If set to true, a highlight style gets applied.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If set to true, disables mouse clicks and the style gets updated.

properties.description: If set, defines the text label.

properties.name: disabled

attributes.name: spacing
attributes.description: Defines the space around the divider. Possible values are s, n and l.

attributes.name: orientation
attributes.description: Defines the orientation of the divider. Possible values are vertical and horizontal.

properties.name: spacing
properties.description: Defines the space around the divider. Possible values are s, n and l.

properties.name: orientation
properties.description: Defines the orientation of the divider. Possible values are vertical and horizontal.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: If set, defines the text label.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: If set, defines the icon shown close to the label.

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Defines the position of the component in the screen. Possible values are left, right, top and bottom.

attributes.name: flex-direction
attributes.description: Defines the direction in which the slotted content flows (e.g. top to bottom or left to right). Possible values are column and row.

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Defines the height of the container (not the overlay).

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Defines the width of the container (not the overlay).

attributes.name: visible
attributes.description: If set to true, displays the component on top of the screen.

attributes.name: sticky
attributes.description: If set to true, clicking on the background will not hide the component. The close icon will also not be displayed.

properties.name: label
properties.description: If set, defines the text label.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: If set, defines the icon shown close to the label.

properties.name: position
properties.description: Defines the position of the component in the screen. Possible values are left, right, top and bottom.

properties.name: flexDirection
properties.description: Defines the direction in which the slotted content flows (e.g. top to bottom or left to right). Possible values are column and row.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Defines the height of the container (not the overlay).

properties.name: width
properties.description: Defines the width of the container (not the overlay).

properties.name: visible
properties.description: If set to true, displays the component on top of the screen.

properties.name: sticky
properties.description: If set to true, clicking on the background will not hide the component. The close icon will also not be displayed.

slots.description: Displayed inside the content area.

slots.name: header
slots.description: If used, the header slot is shown on top of the component, below the label (if any is set).

slots.name: functions

slots.name: footer
slots.description: Shown below the content area.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: If set, defines the text label shown under the icon.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: If set, defines the icon shown above the label.

properties.name: label
properties.description: If set, defines the text label shown under the icon.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: If set, defines the icon shown above the label.

slots.name: footer
slots.description: Displayed below the label.

attributes.name: columns
attributes.description: Defines how many columns the grid has.

attributes.name: rows
attributes.description: If set, defines how many rows the grid has. If left undefined, the rows will be automatically populated according to the columns wrapping.

attributes.name: spacing
attributes.description: Defines the gap between the elements in the grid. Possible values are s (8px), m (12px) and l(16px).

properties.name: columns
properties.description: Defines how many columns the grid has.

properties.name: rows
properties.description: If set, defines how many rows the grid has. If left undefined, the rows will be automatically populated according to the columns wrapping.

properties.name: spacing
properties.description: Defines the gap between the elements in the grid. Possible values are s (8px), m (12px) and l(16px).

slots.description: The slot where the content is rendered.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Defines the icon shown. Takes any string from the Material Design Library or custom url('') pointing to local or remote images or vectors.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: If set, defines the size of the icon. Possible values are xl (48px) l (32px), m (24px) and s (16px), but css font-size can be used to set custom sizes.

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: If set, replaces the text label with a custom icon.

attributes.name: button
attributes.description: If set to true, updates hover, click effects and cursors.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If set to true, disables mouse clicks and the style gets updated.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Defines the icon shown. Takes any string from the Material Design Library or custom url('') pointing to local or remote images or vectors.

properties.name: size
properties.description: If set, defines the size of the icon. Possible values are xl (48px) l (32px), m (24px) and s (16px), but css font-size can be used to set custom sizes.

properties.name: color
properties.description: If set, replaces the text label with a custom icon.

properties.name: button
properties.description: If set to true, updates hover, click effects and cursors.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: If set to true, disables mouse clicks and the style gets updated.

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: Defines the source image to be displayed. Must be a url (web or relative path).

attributes.name: alt
attributes.description: Defines the text shown in case the image cannot be loaded.

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Defines the width of the image. Can take a numeric or percentual value.

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Defines the height of the image. Can take a numeric or percentual value.

attributes.name: fit
attributes.description: Defines how the image fits to the component. Possible values are `fill`, `contain`, `cover`, `none` and `scale-down`.

attributes.name: legend
attributes.description: Defines the legend text.

attributes.name: legend-position
attributes.description: Defines the position of the legend. Possible values are `inner-top` and `inner bottom`. If left unset, the legend is displayed underneath the image

properties.name: src
properties.description: Defines the source image to be displayed. Must be a url (web or relative path).

properties.name: alt
properties.description: Defines the text shown in case the image cannot be loaded.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Defines the width of the image. Can take a numeric or percentual value.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Defines the height of the image. Can take a numeric or percentual value.

properties.name: fit
properties.description: Defines how the image fits to the component. Possible values are `fill`, `contain`, `cover`, `none` and `scale-down`.

properties.name: legend
properties.description: Defines the legend text.

properties.name: legendPosition
properties.description: Defines the position of the legend. Possible values are `inner-top` and `inner bottom`. If left unset, the legend is displayed underneath the image

slots.name: top
slots.description: The container for components overlayed at the top corner of the image.

slots.name: bottom
slots.description: The container for components overlayed at the bottom corner of the image.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: If set, defines the text label shown on top.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: If set, defines the icon shown before the label/value.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: If set, defines the value of the input. Changes upon user interaction.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Defines the type. Possible values are text, number and select.

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: If set, Displays a status icon on the right side of the input.

attributes.name: pattern
attributes.description: (If type="number" only) If set, defines a custom input pattern (see full documentation).

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: (If type="number" only) If set, defines the minimum value accepted.

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: (If type="number" only) If set, defines the maximum value accepted.

attributes.name: step
attributes.description: (If type="number" only) Defines the steps to skip when the user presses the left or right arrows.

attributes.name: condensed
attributes.description: If set to true, reduces the height of the input. The label is only shown if the value is undefined.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: If set to true, highlights the label and underline.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If set to true, disables mouse clicks and the style gets updated.

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: If set to true, disables the input without reducing the opacity.

attributes.name: no-clear
attributes.description: If set to true, the clear icon and functionality will not be available.

attributes.name: autofocus
attributes.description: If set to true, the component gets focused as soon as the page loads.

properties.description: If set, defines the text label shown on top.

properties.description: If set, defines the icon shown before the label/value.

properties.description: If set, defines the value of the input. Changes upon user interaction.

properties.description: If set to true, highlights the label and underline.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: If set to true, disables mouse clicks and the style gets updated.

properties.description: If set to true, disables the input without reducing the opacity.

properties.description: If set to true, the clear icon and functionality will not be available.

properties.name: autofocus
properties.description: If set to true, the component gets focused as soon as the page loads.

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Defines the corner where the notification is located. Possible values are top-left, top-right, bottom-left and bottom-right.

properties.name: position
properties.description: Defines the corner where the notification is located. Possible values are top-left, top-right, bottom-left and bottom-right.

slots.description: Hosts kor-notification-items.

attributes.name: theme
attributes.description: Defines the color theme of the page. Possible values are dark and light.

attributes.name: padding
attributes.description: Defines the padding style of the default slot.

attributes.name: flex-direction
attributes.description: Defines the direction in which the slotted content flows (e.g. top to bottom or left to right). Possible values are column and row.

attributes.name: flat
attributes.description: If set to true, the page background will be flat, without the need to use card as containers for the content.

attributes.name: scrollable
attributes.description: If set to true, the page content will scroll if there is an overflow of content.

properties.name: theme
properties.description: Defines the color theme of the page. Possible values are dark and light.

properties.name: padding
properties.description: Defines the padding style of the default slot.

properties.name: flexDirection
properties.description: Defines the direction in which the slotted content flows (e.g. top to bottom or left to right). Possible values are column and row.

properties.name: flat
properties.description: If set to true, the page background will be flat, without the need to use card as containers for the content.

properties.name: scrollable
properties.description: If set to true, the page content will scroll if there is an overflow of content.

slots.description: The main content area.

slots.name: top
slots.description: Shown on the top. Hosts components such as kor-app-bar and kor-nav-bar.

slots.name: bottom

slots.name: left
slots.description: Shown on the left side. Hosts components such as kor-pane.

slots.name: right
slots.description: Shown on the right side. Hosts components such as kor-pane.

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Defines the DOM element to which the click event will be attached. It behaves identically to querySelector, which means tag names, IDs, classes and similar can be used (e.g. #myEl, .myEl, kor-input[type='number']). Please ensure the selector is unique.

attributes.description: If set to true, displays the component on top of the screen.

attributes.name: sticky
attributes.description: If set to true, clicking on the page will not hide the component.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: If set, defines the text label shown above the bar.

attributes.name: info
attributes.description: If set, defines the info text shown below of the bar.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Defines the value of the bar. Must be a number from 0 to 100.

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: If set, shows a status icon besides the information text. Possible values are success, warning and error.

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: If set, defines the color of the bar.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: (Only if radial is true) Defines the size of the bar.

attributes.name: radial
attributes.description: If set to true, the bar will become a circle instead of a linear bar.

attributes.name: show-progress
attributes.description: If set to true, the value (in %) will be visible.

properties.name: label
properties.description: If set, defines the text label shown above the bar.

properties.name: info
properties.description: If set, defines the info text shown below of the bar.

properties.name: value
properties.description: Defines the value of the bar. Must be a number from 0 to 100.

properties.name: status
properties.description: If set, shows a status icon besides the information text. Possible values are success, warning and error.

properties.name: color
properties.description: If set, defines the color of the bar.

properties.name: size
properties.description: (Only if radial is true) Defines the size of the bar.

properties.name: radial
properties.description: If set to true, the bar will become a circle instead of a linear bar.

properties.name: showProgress
properties.description: If set to true, the value (in %) will be visible.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: If set, defines the text label.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: If set to true, a highlight style gets applied. Only one item can be active at a time.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If set to true, disables mouse clicks and the style gets updated.

properties.name: label
properties.description: If set, defines the text label.

properties.name: active
properties.description: If set to true, a highlight style gets applied. Only one item can be active at a time.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: If set to true, disables mouse clicks and the style gets updated.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: If set, defines the text label shown on top.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Defines the current value. Must be a value between min and max.

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: Defines the minimum value accepted.

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: Defines the maximum value accepted.

attributes.name: step
attributes.description: Defines the steps to skip when the user drags the thumb.

attributes.name: input
attributes.description: If set to true, allows the user to input a value using the keyboard.

properties.name: label
properties.description: If set, defines the text label shown on top.

properties.name: value
properties.description: Defines the current value. Must be a value between min and max.

properties.name: min
properties.description: Defines the minimum value accepted.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: If set, defines the text label.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Defines the size of the component. Possible values are s (24px), m (32px) and l (40px).

properties.name: label

properties.name: size
properties.description: Defines the size of the component. Possible values are s (24px), m (32px) and l (40px).

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: If set, defines the text label.

attributes.name: info
attributes.description: If set, defines the information text shown below the label.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: If set, defines the icon shown instead of the index number.

attributes.name: index
attributes.description: Defines the index number shown inside the bubble (if icon is undefined). It is set dinamically by the component.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: If set to true, a highlight style gets applied. Only one item can be active at a time.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If set to true, disables mouse clicks and the style gets updated.

slots.description: Hosts kor-switch-items.

attributes.name: alignment
attributes.description: Defines the alignment of items inside the cell. Possible values are left, center and right.

attributes.name: sort-direction
attributes.description: (If head, sortable and sorted are true) Defines the direction of sorting. Possible values are asc and desc.

attributes.name: grid-cols
attributes.description: Defines how many columns the cell occupies. The sum of all cells in a given row should not surpass the total number of columns in the table (which is 24 by default).

attributes.name: head
attributes.description: If set to true, the cell will behave like a table head (use if the parent kor-table-row is placed on the header slot of the table).

attributes.name: sortable
attributes.description: (If head is true) If set to true, upon clicking on the cell it will toggle the sorted property.

attributes.name: sorted
attributes.description: (If head and sortable are true) If set to true, an arrow will be shown to indicate that the column is sorted.

properties.name: alignment
properties.description: Defines the alignment of items inside the cell. Possible values are left, center and right.

properties.name: sortDirection
properties.description: (If head, sortable and sorted are true) Defines the direction of sorting. Possible values are asc and desc.

properties.name: gridCols
properties.description: Defines how many columns the cell occupies. The sum of all cells in a given row should not surpass the total number of columns in the table (which is 24 by default).

properties.name: head
properties.description: If set to true, the cell will behave like a table head (use if the parent kor-table-row is placed on the header slot of the table).

properties.name: sortable
properties.description: (If head is true) If set to true, upon clicking on the cell it will toggle the sorted property.

properties.name: sorted
properties.description: (If head and sortable are true) If set to true, an arrow will be shown to indicate that the column is sorted.

slots.description: Hosts plain text or other elements.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: If set to true, a highlight style gets applied.

properties.name: active
properties.description: If set to true, a highlight style gets applied.

slots.description: Hosts (kor-table-cells).

attributes.name: columns
attributes.description: Defines the column template. It accepts any value also accepted by the standard css grid-template-columns (e.g. repeat(4, 1fr), 40px 1fr auto).

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: If set to true, disables selection on mouse clicks and the hover effects.

attributes.name: condensed
attributes.description: If set to true, condensed the height of the rows and cells.

properties.name: columns
properties.description: Defines the column template. It accepts any value also accepted by the standard css grid-template-columns (e.g. repeat(4, 1fr), 40px 1fr auto).

properties.name: readonly
properties.description: If set to true, disables selection on mouse clicks and the hover effects.

properties.name: condensed
properties.description: If set to true, condensed the height of the rows and cells.

slots.description: The container where the table body is rendered (kor-table-rows).

slots.name: header
slots.description: The container for the header (kor-table-row). It does not scroll with the content, but remains sticky on top.

attributes.description: If set to true, a highlight style gets applied. Only one item can be active at a time.

attributes.description: If set to true, disables mouse clicks and the style gets updated.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: If set, defines the text label.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: If set, defines the icon shown besides the label.

attributes.name: button
attributes.description: If set to true, hover and click effects will be added.

attributes.name: removable
attributes.description: If set to true, a close icon is displayed. Clicking on it dispatches a remove event.

properties.name: label
properties.description: If set, defines the text label.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: If set, defines the icon shown besides the label.

properties.name: button
properties.description: If set to true, hover and click effects will be added.

properties.name: removable
properties.description: If set to true, a close icon is displayed. Clicking on it dispatches a remove event.

events.name: remove
events.description: Dispatched when clicking on the close icon (removable only).

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Defines the size, line height, font family and initial color of the text. Possible values are header-1, header-2, body-1 and body-1, but custom styles can be set through css.

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: If set, overwrites the initial color of the text. Possible values are var(--text-1) (90% neutral color), var(--text-2) (60% neutral color) and var(--text-3) (20% neutral color), but any custom RGB, RGBA, HEX or color variable can be passed to the property as value as well.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Defines the size, line height, font family and initial color of the text. Possible values are header-1, header-2, body-1 and body-1, but custom styles can be set through css.

properties.name: color
properties.description: If set, overwrites the initial color of the text. Possible values are var(--text-1) (90% neutral color), var(--text-2) (60% neutral color) and var(--text-3) (20% neutral color), but any custom RGB, RGBA, HEX or color variable can be passed to the property as value as well.

slots.description: Container where plain text (and/or other elements) is written.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: If set, defines the text label shown on top.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: If set, defines the value of the input. Changes upon user interaction.

attributes.name: rows
attributes.description: Defines the visible number of lines in a text area.

attributes.name: max-length
attributes.description: Defines the maximum number of characters allowed in the text area.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: If set to true, highlights the label and underline.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If set to true, disables mouse clicks and the style gets updated.

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: If set to true, disables the input without reducing the opacity.

attributes.name: autofocus
attributes.description: If set to true, the component gets focused as soon as the page loads.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: If set, defines the text label.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: If set, defines the icon shown close to the label.

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Defines the position of the component in the screen. Possible values are left, right, top and bottom.

attributes.name: flex-direction
attributes.description: Defines the direction in which the slotted content flows (e.g. top to bottom or left to right). Possible values are column and row.

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Defines the DOM element to which the mouseover event will be attached. It behaves identically to querySelector, which means tag names, IDs, classes and similar can be used (e.g. #myEl, .myEl, kor-input[type='number']). Please ensure the selector is unique.

attributes.name: visible
attributes.description: If set to true, displays the component on top of the screen.

properties.name: label
properties.description: If set, defines the text label.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: If set, defines the icon shown close to the label.

properties.name: position
properties.description: Defines the position of the component in the screen. Possible values are left, right, top and bottom.

properties.name: flexDirection
properties.description: Defines the direction in which the slotted content flows (e.g. top to bottom or left to right). Possible values are column and row.

properties.name: target
properties.description: Defines the DOM element to which the mouseover event will be attached. It behaves identically to querySelector, which means tag names, IDs, classes and similar can be used (e.g. #myEl, .myEl, kor-input[type='number']). Please ensure the selector is unique.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: If set to true, displays the component on top of the screen.

slots.description: Displayed inside the content area.

slots.name: header
slots.description: If used, the header slot is shown on top of the component, below the label (if any is set).

slots.name: functions
slots.description: Displayed on the right side of the label or header slot.

slots.name: footer
slots.description: Displayed below the content area.
